General.Name: Rhone Ma Holdings Bhd
General.Description: Rhone Ma Holdings Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in the manufacture, trading, marketing, and distribution of animal health products primarily in Malaysia. It operates through Animal Health Products and Equipment, Food Ingredients, and Others segments. The company provides diagnostic laboratory analysis and consultation services to veterinary, agriculture, and food industries; and distributes pharmaceutical and veterinary products, including animal feeds. It also provides tests and diagnostics services for human healthcare; offers management services; training services; veterinary advisory servicesconducts research and development in biotechnology; distributes human healthcare and related products; trades biotechnology and animal health products; and undertakes research and development activities related to animal health, food safety, and agriculture. In addition, the company distributes and supplies food ingredients. Additionally, it is involved in the raising, breeding, and production of semidomesticated animals; wholesale, distribution, and retail sale of livestock feed; and dairy farming business. Rhone Ma Holdings Berhad was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Petaling Jaya, Malaysia.
